summary: Most frontend requirements are implemented: a single-page responsive marketing layout with Hero/Services/About/Contact sections, consistent warm (non-blue/purple) theme tokens, contact details shown in header/footer/contact, an inquiry form with inline validation and success state, and frontend references to generated logo/hero images. Backend supports inquiry persistence and timestamps but lacks the requested basic input checks. Some extra, unrequested features (Internet Identity integration and footer attribution/UTM tracking) appear to have been added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend method performs basic input checks (e.g., non-empty required strings) when submitting an inquiry.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend `submitInquiry` method stores the inquiry without validating required fields (e.g., empty `fullName`, `email`, `message`, or `consentGiven`). No checks or traps/guards are shown before persisting.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and identity-aware actor creation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude third-party authentication/social logins; the diff adds Internet Identity hooks/provider and identity-dependent actor creation logic not requested for a public marketing/inquiry flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution and UTM/appIdentifier tracking logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; footer includes additional attribution/marketing tracking behavior (as indicated by the file summary mentioning 'caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking' and code computing an appIdentifier).
